qas.question: What is a frequent modern function of country pubs?

answers.text: providing seating facilities for the consumption of food

qas.question: Along with community meetings, what was the traditional purpose of country pubs?

context: In more recent years, however, many country pubs have either closed down, or have been converted to establishments intent on <a0_0>providing seating facilities for the consumption of food<a0_0/>, rather than a venue for members of the local community meeting and convivially <a1_0>drinking<a1_0/>.
